scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach -Wt --exclude optimizely-dxp-clients run build
scripts.rebuild: yarn workspaces foreach -Wt --exclude optimizely-dxp-clients run rebuild
scripts.watch: yarn workspaces foreach -Apt --exclude optimizely-dxp-clients run watch
scripts.pack: yarn install && yarn run build && yarn workspaces foreach -Wt --exclude optimizely-dxp-clients pack --install-if-needed --out ../../artefacts/%s-%v.tgz
scripts.update-deps: yarn upgrade-interactive && yarn dedupe && yarn sdks vscode
scripts.update-yarn: yarn set version --yarn-path --only-if-needed stable && yarn install && yarn dedupe && yarn sdks vscode
scripts.update-all: yarn run update-yarn && yarn run update-deps
